optionsMenuDescription7:
Sets you back some time before you started lagging
You will not miss any notes because of lag anymore this way
Hold ctrl to ignore the lagback
editorKeybinds:
Scroll Wheel - Change current time in song
Left, Right - Change selected event rotation (according to current snap)
Up, Down - Change selected event time (according to current snap)
LMB on an event - Select event
RMB on an event - Delete event
LMB or RMB on empty space - Deselect current event
LMB and drag - Move event (works on hold ends too)
Shift + LMB - Multi select events
  Click once to select start point, again to select end point
Alt + LMB + drag - Multi select events (alternate)
  Selects events only in the highlighted area
Alt + F4 - Quit Sibelius
Ctrl + LMB - Duplicate clicked event (C + LMB if ctrl select is on)
Hold Alt - Show navigation wheel

Esc - Exit editor
S - Saves changes
P - Plays level (from current beat)
F - Jump to position of selected event(s)
Ctrl + P - Plays level (from start)
Ctrl + C - Copies selected events (only if multiselected)
Ctrl + V - Pastes copied events
Ctrl + R - Resets editor window positions
Ctrl + G - Opens "Go to beat" window if closed
Ctrl + I - Opens "Level properties" window if closed
Ctrl + D - Change the variant you're editing

All of the following keybinds only work during playtesting:
P - Return to editor (at current beat)
Esc - Return to editor (at playtest start beat)
Period - Place a marker at the current beat
[ - Reduce ratemod by 0.1x
] - Increase ratemod by 0.1x
